title: GET Campaigns Endpoint
description: Simple GET endpoint at /campaigns that fetches all campaigns from Appwrite database.

title: Campaign Response Schema
description: Type-safe array response schema with all campaign fields including ID, name, subject, status, and metrics.

title: Campaign Data Retrieval
description: Fetches all campaigns from Appwrite and maps them to the response schema format.

title: Error Handling
description: Comprehensive error handling with proper status codes and error messages.
